mapper.select: select * from tbl_food order by food_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_food(food_num, food_code, food_name, food_price, food_count, food_image) values(seq_food_num.nextval,'#{food_code}','#{food_name}',#{food_price},#{food_count},'#{food_image}')
mapper.update: update tbl_food set food_code = '#{food_code}', food_name = '#{food_name}', food_price = #{food_price}, food_count = #{food_count}, food_image = '#{food_image}' where food_num = #{food_num}
